data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Lisandro Semedo puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 9, Great play from George Cox to set up the goal.
Sittard have been given a penalty...
Sebastian Polter smashes in a penalty at Fortuna Sittard Stadion. The score is now 2-0.
In the minute 33, At Fortuna Sittard Stadion, Lazaros Rota has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! Zian Flemming extends Sittard's lead to 3-0.
Tesfaldet Tekie with an assist there.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
The second-half is now underway.
Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a first substitution, with Kwasi Okyere Wriedt replacing Gorkem Saglam.
In the minute 52, Derrick Kohn for Willem II has been booked by Kevin Blom and receives a first yellow card.
Sjors Ultee is making the team's first substitution at Fortuna Sittard Stadion with Branislav Ninaj replacing Lazaros Rota.
Freek Heerkens (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Kevin Blom.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Derrick Kohn with Freek Heerkens. This is the second substitution made today by Adrie Koster.
Vangelis Pavlidis is booked for the away team.
John Yeboah is on a sub for Che Nunnely for Willem II.
In the minute 66, Vangelis Pavlidis keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Pol Llonch.
Mike van Beijnen is replacing Emil Hansson for the home team.
In the minute 74, Pol Llonch (Willem II) gets a yellow card.
Wesley Spieringhs is replacing Mats Kohlert for Willem II at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Sjors Ultee (Sittard) is making a third substitution, with Djibril Dianessy replacing Lisandro Semedo.
In the minute 87, Goal! Jan-Arie Van der Heijden pulls one back to make it 3-2.
Pol Llonch in Willem II has been yellow-carded a second time by Kevin Blom and is being sent off.
That's full-time at Fortuna Sittard Stadion. The final score is 3-2.
